item.title: 10 Best Sports Movies Based On True Stories
item.description: From Raging Bull and 42 to Coach Carter and more, here are the best sports movies ever made based on true stories.

item.title: This Stunning World War II Movie With 94% On Rotten Tomatoes Is The Closest We're Getting To A Modern Rambo
item.description: Rambo is a landmark franchise and has few peers, but there is one movie that critics adore that could currently capture Rambo's many fans.

item.title: Star Wars: What Happened to Jar Jar Binks After Revenge of the Sith?
item.description: Have you ever wondered what happened to the most hated character in Star Wars after Revenge of the Sith? Today, we tell you the tragic tale of Jar Jar Binks after the prequels.
